# Welcome to Arabesque documentation

![Arabesque's documentation logo](images/logo_arabesque_DOC.png)

_Arabesque_ is a web application for thematic mapping of flow and spatial networks datasets. This documentation aims to present how _Arabesque_ works and how to use it using examples datasets provided.

**Summary:**

* [Authors](#authors)
* [Interface presentation](#interface)
* [Data importation](#data-import)
* [Data processing](#data-processing)
* [Designing flowmap background](#background-design)
* [Designing flowmap signs](#sign-design)
* [Filtering flowdata](#filtering)
* [Examples/datasets](#examples)
* [Exporting flowmap](#export)
* [References](#references)
* [gflowiz/arabesque project](#gflowiz-project)


Access to [Arabesque_ documentation](https://gflowiz.github.io/arabesque-doc/) </br>
